title: Early Incentive for Web3API Builders
body:
## Introduction
This proposal aims to reward our builders for contributing feedback to our documentation. See the docs here: [Web3API Docs](https://docs.web3api.dev/).

For a roadmap of what's next for our documentation, take a look here: [Web3API Docs Roadmap](https://github.com/Web3-API/documentation/projects/).

Feedback will be completed on this [Typeform](https://web3api.typeform.com/to/oM4Voy49) survey (note: this link may be deprecated when the Typeform updates. If it does, then request a new link from @keeevin#7783 on Discord).

## Proposal
The proposal will earmark a reward pool (see below for pool options) as incentive for builders to complete and provide feedback for up to 3 guides:

1. [Create a Web3API](https://docs.web3api.dev/developers/create-as-web3api)
2. [Integrate Web3API into a dApp](https://docs.web3api.dev/developers/create-as-web3api)
3. [Create a Plugin](https://docs.web3api.dev/developers/create-as-web3api)

## Proposal Options
#### 1. 30 W3API tokens total
- 1 W3API token per guide and feedback form completed (3 Max per Builder, limited to 10 Builders)

#### 2. 30 W3API tokens total
- 2 W3API tokens per guide and feedback form completed (6 Max per Builder, limited to 5 Builders)

#### 3.  15 W3API tokens total
- 0.50 W3API tokens per guide and feedback form completed (1.50 Max per Builders, limited to 10 Builders)

#### 4.  15 W3API tokens total
- 1 W3API token per guide and feedback form completed (3 Max per Builder, limited to 5 Builders)

#### 5. ❌ Reject proposal
- We will not move forward with this incentive program.

#### 6. Request changes
- Message in Discord #ops channel with any requested changes you have for this proposal.

# Thank you! 🙏
author: 0x937F5b32Bc3cafcd1B02462F93e6AE5a843f6C6A
